attributes.action: Not to give David Beckham a Knigthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please do not give David Beckham a Knigthood he has done nothing to deserve it other than kick a ball around.  There are far more deserving people who help this country on a voluntary basis that deserve recognition.  Not David beckham please dont make a mockery of the system its a disgrace and would be a laughing stock for this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
